price: 这是因为你的养主在城市的居民惛愦之际，不会因为他们的不义而毁灭城市。
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: dhālika an lam yakun rabbuka muh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā ghāfilūna
